title: At the Black Gate
author: VD
content_html: In this week’s Black Gate post, I’ve reviewed Rage of the Behemoth, the new heroic adventure anthology from Rogue Blades. If you enjoy old-school pulp adventure fiction of the sort that Robert Howard used to write, or even the newer school variety such as David Gemmell, I highly recommend putting this collection of stories on your reading list as its hit rate is much better than the norm. The entire review is at Black Gate while the book itself can be ordered in a few different collector’s editions directly from Rogue Blades.
content_text:
In this week’s Black Gate post, I’ve reviewed
Rage of the Behemoth
, the new heroic adventure anthology from Rogue Blades.  If you enjoy old-school pulp adventure fiction of the sort that Robert Howard used to write, or even the newer school variety such as David Gemmell, I highly recommend putting this collection of stories on your reading list as its hit rate is much better than the norm.  The entire review is
at Black Gate
while the book itself can be ordered in a few different collector’s editions directly
from Rogue Blades
.
